java
package top.miqiu._01_hello;

import com.rabbitmq.client.Channel;
import com.rabbitmq.client.Connection;
import com.rabbitmq.client.ConnectionFactory;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException;

public class Producer {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, TimeoutException {
        // 1. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å·¥å‚
        ConnectionFactory connectionFactory = new ConnectionFactory();
        // 2. è®¾ç½® RabbitMQ æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„ IPã€ç«¯å£ã€ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç 
        connectionFactory.setHost("ipï¼ˆè¦æ¢æˆçœŸå®çš„ipå“¦ï¼‰");
        connectionFactory.setPort(5672);
        connectionFactory.setUsername("admin");
        connectionFactory.setPassword("admin");

        // 3. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = connectionFactory.newConnection();
        // 4. åˆ›å»º Channel
        Channel channel = connection.createChannel();

        // 5. å£°æ˜é˜Ÿåˆ—
        /**
         * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
         * 1. é˜Ÿåˆ—åç§°ï¼š01-hello2
         * 2. æ˜¯å¦æŒä¹…åŒ–ï¼štrueï¼ˆé‡å¯åé˜Ÿåˆ—ä»ç„¶å­˜åœ¨ï¼‰
         * 3. æ˜¯å¦ç‹¬å é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼šfalseï¼ˆå…è®¸å¤šä¸ªæ¶ˆè´¹è€…è¿æ¥ï¼‰
         * 4. æ˜¯å¦è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ é™¤ï¼šfalseï¼ˆé˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨åˆ é™¤ï¼‰
         * 5. é¢å¤–å‚æ•°ï¼šnull
         */
        channel.queueDeclare("01-hello2", true, false, false, null);

        // 6. å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯
        /**
         * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
         * 1. äº¤æ¢æœºåç§°ï¼šç©ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼ˆä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤äº¤æ¢æœºï¼‰
         * 2. è·¯ç”±é”®ï¼šé˜Ÿåˆ—åç§°ï¼ˆ01-hello2ï¼‰
         * 3. é¢å¤–å±æ€§ï¼šnull
         * 4. æ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹ï¼šå­—èŠ‚æ•°ç»„
         */
        channel.basicPublish("", "01-hello2", null, "hello rabbitmq2".getBytes());
        System.out.println("æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€æˆåŠŸ");

        // 7. å…³é—­èµ„æº
        channel.close();
        connection.close();
    }
}

java
package top.miqiu._01_hello_c;

import com.rabbitmq.client.*;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException;

public class Consumer {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, TimeoutException {
        // 1. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å·¥å‚
        ConnectionFactory connectionFactory = new ConnectionFactory();
        // 2. è®¾ç½® RabbitMQ æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„ IPã€ç«¯å£ã€ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç 
        connectionFactory.setHost("ipï¼ˆè¦æ¢æˆçœŸå®çš„ipå“¦");
        connectionFactory.setPort(5672);
        connectionFactory.setUsername("admin");
        connectionFactory.setPassword("admin");

        // 3. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = connectionFactory.newConnection();
        // 4. åˆ›å»º Channel
        Channel channel = connection.createChannel();

        // 5. å£°æ˜é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼ˆéœ€ä¸ç”Ÿäº§è€…ä¿æŒä¸€è‡´ï¼‰
        channel.queueDeclare("01-hello2", false, false, false, null);

        // 6. æ¥æ”¶æ¶ˆæ¯
        /**
         * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
         * 1. é˜Ÿåˆ—åç§°ï¼š01-hello2
         * 2. æ˜¯å¦è‡ªåŠ¨ç¡®è®¤ï¼štrueï¼ˆæ¶ˆæ¯è¢«æ¶ˆè´¹åè‡ªåŠ¨ç¡®è®¤ï¼‰
         * 3. æ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†å›è°ƒï¼šDeliverCallback
         * 4. æ¶ˆæ¯å–æ¶ˆå›è°ƒï¼šCancelCallback
         */
        channel.basicConsume("01-hello2", true, new DeliverCallback() {
            @Override
            public void handle(String consumerTag, Delivery delivery) throws IOException {
                System.out.println("æ¥æ”¶åˆ°æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼š" + new String(delivery.getBody()));
            }
        }, new CancelCallback() {
            @Override
            public void handle(String consumerTag) throws IOException {
                System.out.println("æ¶ˆæ¯è¢«å–æ¶ˆ");
            }
        });
    }
}

å·¥ä½œæ¨¡å¼æ˜¯ RabbitMQ çš„ä¸€ç§å¸¸è§æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œç”¨äºå°†ä»»åŠ¡åˆ†å‘ç»™å¤šä¸ªæ¶ˆè´¹è€…ã€‚å®ƒçš„ç‰¹ç‚¹æ˜¯ï¼š

  2. å¤šä¸ªæ¶ˆè´¹è€…ï¼šå…±åŒæ¶ˆè´¹åŒä¸€ä¸ªé˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­çš„æ¶ˆæ¯ã€‚
  3. æ¶ˆæ¯åˆ†å‘æœºåˆ¶ï¼šé»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼ŒRabbitMQ ä¼šä»¥è½®è¯¢ï¼ˆRound-Robinï¼‰çš„æ–¹å¼å°†æ¶ˆæ¯åˆ†å‘ç»™æ¶ˆè´¹è€…ã€‚

å·¥ä½œæ¨¡å¼é€‚ç”¨äºä»»åŠ¡åˆ†å‘åœºæ™¯ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚å°†è€—æ—¶çš„ä»»åŠ¡åˆ†å‘ç»™å¤šä¸ª Worker å¤„ç†ã€‚

ç”Ÿäº§è€…è´Ÿè´£åˆ›å»ºæ¶ˆæ¯å¹¶å°†å…¶å‘é€åˆ°æŒ‡å®šçš„é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­ã€‚

java
package top.miqiu._02_work;

import com.rabbitmq.client.Channel;
import com.rabbitmq.client.Connection;
import com.rabbitmq.client.ConnectionFactory;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException;

public class Producer {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, TimeoutException {
        // 1. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å·¥å‚
        ConnectionFactory connectionFactory = new ConnectionFactory();
        // 2. è®¾ç½® RabbitMQ æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„ IPã€ç«¯å£ã€ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç 
        connectionFactory.setHost("ä½ çš„ipï¼åˆ«å¿˜äº†æ”¹");
        connectionFactory.setPort(5672);
        connectionFactory.setUsername("admin");
        connectionFactory.setPassword("admin");

        // 3. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = connectionFactory.newConnection();
        // 4. åˆ›å»º Channel
        Channel channel = connection.createChannel();

        // 5. å£°æ˜é˜Ÿåˆ—
        /**
         * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
         * 1. é˜Ÿåˆ—åç§°ï¼š02-work1
         * 2. æ˜¯å¦æŒä¹…åŒ–ï¼štrueï¼ˆé‡å¯åé˜Ÿåˆ—ä»ç„¶å­˜åœ¨ï¼‰
         * 3. æ˜¯å¦ç‹¬å é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼šfalseï¼ˆå…è®¸å¤šä¸ªæ¶ˆè´¹è€…è¿æ¥ï¼‰
         * 4. æ˜¯å¦è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ é™¤ï¼šfalseï¼ˆé˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨åˆ é™¤ï¼‰
         * 5. é¢å¤–å‚æ•°ï¼šnull
         */
        channel.queueDeclare("02-work1", true, false, false, null);

        // 6. å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯
        for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
            String message = "hello work:" + i;
            channel.basicPublish("", "02-work1", null, message.getBytes());
        }
        System.out.println("æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€æˆåŠŸ");

        // 7. å…³é—­èµ„æº
        channel.close();
        connection.close();
    }
}

å…³é”®ç‚¹ï¼š â€‹

  1. é˜Ÿåˆ—å£°æ˜ï¼ˆqueueDeclareï¼‰ï¼šåˆ›å»ºé˜Ÿåˆ—å¹¶è®¾ç½®é˜Ÿåˆ—å±æ€§ã€‚
  2. æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€ï¼ˆbasicPublishï¼‰ï¼šé€šè¿‡å¾ªç¯å‘é€å¤šæ¡æ¶ˆæ¯åˆ°é˜Ÿåˆ—ã€‚
  3. æŒä¹…åŒ–é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼šè®¾ç½®ä¸º trueï¼Œç¡®ä¿é˜Ÿåˆ—åœ¨ RabbitMQ é‡å¯åä»ç„¶å­˜åœ¨ã€‚

ä»£ç  â€‹

æ¶ˆè´¹è€…è´Ÿè´£ä»é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æ¥æ”¶å¹¶å¤„ç†æ¶ˆæ¯ã€‚

java
package top.miqiu._02_work;

import com.rabbitmq.client.*;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException;

public class Consumer {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, TimeoutException {
        // 1. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å·¥å‚
        ConnectionFactory connectionFactory = new ConnectionFactory();
        // 2. è®¾ç½® RabbitMQ æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„ IPã€ç«¯å£ã€ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç 
        connectionFactory.setHost("ä½ çš„ipï¼åˆ«å¿˜äº†æ”¹");
        connectionFactory.setPort(5672);
        connectionFactory.setUsername("admin");
        connectionFactory.setPassword("admin");

        // 3. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = connectionFactory.newConnection();
        // 4. åˆ›å»º Channel
        Channel channel = connection.createChannel();

        // 5. å£°æ˜é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼ˆéœ€ä¸ç”Ÿäº§è€…ä¿æŒä¸€è‡´ï¼‰
        channel.queueDeclare("02-work1", true, false, false, null);

        // 6. è®¾ç½®æ¯æ¬¡åªæ¥æ”¶ä¸€æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯
        channel.basicQos(1);

        // 7. æ¥æ”¶æ¶ˆæ¯
        /**
         * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
         * 1. é˜Ÿåˆ—åç§°ï¼š02-work1
         * 2. æ˜¯å¦è‡ªåŠ¨ç¡®è®¤ï¼šfalseï¼ˆæ‰‹åŠ¨ç¡®è®¤æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼‰
         * 3. æ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†å›è°ƒï¼šDeliverCallback
         * 4. æ¶ˆæ¯å–æ¶ˆå›è°ƒï¼šCancelCallback
         */
        channel.basicConsume("02-work1", false, new DeliverCallback() {
            @Override
            public void handle(String consumerTag, Delivery delivery) throws IOException {
                try {
                    // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†è€—æ—¶
                    Thread.sleep(1000);
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
                System.out.println("æ¶ˆè´¹è€…1 æ¥æ”¶åˆ°æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼š" + new String(delivery.getBody()));
                // æ‰‹åŠ¨ç¡®è®¤æ¶ˆæ¯
                channel.basicAck(delivery.getEnvelope().getDeliveryTag(), false);
            }
        }, new CancelCallback() {
            @Override
            public void handle(String consumerTag) throws IOException {
                System.out.println("æ¶ˆæ¯è¢«å–æ¶ˆ");
            }
        });
    }
}

    • å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ basicQos è®¾ç½®æ¯æ¬¡åªæ¥æ”¶ä¸€æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œé¿å…æŸä¸ªæ¶ˆè´¹è€…å¤„ç†è¿‡å¤šæ¶ˆæ¯ã€‚

    • å¦‚æœæ¶ˆè´¹è€…åœ¨å¤„ç†æ¶ˆæ¯æ—¶å´©æºƒï¼Œæœªç¡®è®¤çš„æ¶ˆæ¯ä¼šé‡æ–°åˆ†å‘ç»™å…¶ä»–æ¶ˆè´¹è€…ã€‚

å‘å¸ƒè®¢é˜…æ¨¡å¼ï¼ˆPublish/Subscribe Modeï¼‰æ˜¯ RabbitMQ çš„ä¸€ç§æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œç”¨äºå°†æ¶ˆæ¯å¹¿æ’­ç»™å¤šä¸ªæ¶ˆè´¹è€…ã€‚å®ƒçš„ç‰¹ç‚¹æ˜¯ï¼š

ç”Ÿäº§è€…è´Ÿè´£åˆ›å»ºæ¶ˆæ¯å¹¶å°†å…¶å‘é€åˆ°æŒ‡å®šçš„äº¤æ¢æœºä¸­ã€‚

java
package top.miqiu._03_pubsub;

import com.rabbitmq.client.Channel;
import com.rabbitmq.client.Connection;
import com.rabbitmq.client.ConnectionFactory;
import com.rabbitmq.client.MessageProperties;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException;

public class Producer {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, TimeoutException {
        // 1. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å·¥å‚
        ConnectionFactory connectionFactory = new ConnectionFactory();
        // 2. è®¾ç½® RabbitMQ æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„ IPã€ç«¯å£ã€ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç 
        connectionFactory.setHost("ç”¨è‡ªå·±çš„ipï¼ï¼");
        connectionFactory.setPort(5672);
        connectionFactory.setUsername("admin");
        connectionFactory.setPassword("admin");

        // 3. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = connectionFactory.newConnection();
        // 4. åˆ›å»º Channel
        Channel channel = connection.createChannel();

        // 5. å£°æ˜äº¤æ¢æœº
        /**
         * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
         * 1. äº¤æ¢æœºåç§°ï¼š03-pubsub
         * 2. äº¤æ¢æœºç±»å‹ï¼šfanoutï¼ˆå¹¿æ’­æ¨¡å¼ï¼‰
         */
        channel.exchangeDeclare("03-pubsub", "fanout");

        // 6. å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯
        for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
            String message = "hello work:" + i;
            /**
             * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
             * 1. äº¤æ¢æœºåç§°ï¼š03-pubsub
             * 2. è·¯ç”±é”®ï¼šç©ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼ˆfanout æ¨¡å¼å¿½ç•¥è·¯ç”±é”®ï¼‰
             * 3. æ¶ˆæ¯å±æ€§ï¼šMessageProperties.TEXT_PLAIN
             * 4. æ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹ï¼šå­—èŠ‚æ•°ç»„
             */
            channel.basicPublish("03-pubsub", "", MessageProperties.TEXT_PLAIN, message.getBytes());
        }
        System.out.println("æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€æˆåŠŸ");

        // 7. å…³é—­èµ„æº
        channel.close();
        connection.close();
    }
}

å…³é”®ç‚¹ï¼š â€‹

  1. äº¤æ¢æœºå£°æ˜ï¼ˆexchangeDeclareï¼‰ï¼šåˆ›å»ºäº¤æ¢æœºå¹¶è®¾ç½®ç±»å‹ä¸º fanoutï¼ˆå¹¿æ’­æ¨¡å¼ï¼‰ã€‚
  2. æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€ï¼ˆbasicPublishï¼‰ï¼šå°†æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€åˆ°äº¤æ¢æœºï¼Œè·¯ç”±é”®ä¸ºç©ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼ˆfanout æ¨¡å¼å¿½ç•¥è·¯ç”±é”®ï¼‰ã€‚
  3. æ¶ˆæ¯å¹¿æ’­ï¼šæ¶ˆæ¯ä¼šè¢«å¹¿æ’­åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰ç»‘å®šåˆ°è¯¥äº¤æ¢æœºçš„é˜Ÿåˆ—ã€‚

ï¼ˆä¸‰ï¼‰æ¶ˆè´¹è€…ä»£ç è§£æ â€‹

ä»£ç  â€‹

æ¶ˆè´¹è€…è´Ÿè´£ä»é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æ¥æ”¶å¹¶å¤„ç†æ¶ˆæ¯ã€‚

java
package top.miqiu._03_pubsub;

import com.rabbitmq.client.*;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException;

public class Consumer2 {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, TimeoutException {
        // 1. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å·¥å‚
        ConnectionFactory connectionFactory = new ConnectionFactory();
        // 2. è®¾ç½® RabbitMQ æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„ IPã€ç«¯å£ã€ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç 
        connectionFactory.setHost("ç”¨è‡ªå·±çš„ipï¼ï¼");
        connectionFactory.setPort(5672);
        connectionFactory.setUsername("admin");
        connectionFactory.setPassword("admin");

        // 3. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = connectionFactory.newConnection();
        // 4. åˆ›å»º Channel
        Channel channel = connection.createChannel();

        // 5. å£°æ˜äº¤æ¢æœº
        channel.exchangeDeclare("03-pubsub", "fanout");

        // 6. åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶é˜Ÿåˆ—
        String queue = channel.queueDeclare().getQueue();

        // 7. ç»‘å®šé˜Ÿåˆ—åˆ°äº¤æ¢æœº
        /**
         * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
         * 1. é˜Ÿåˆ—åç§°ï¼šqueue
         * 2. äº¤æ¢æœºåç§°ï¼š03-pubsub
         * 3. è·¯ç”±é”®ï¼šç©ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼ˆfanout æ¨¡å¼å¿½ç•¥è·¯ç”±é”®ï¼‰
         */
        channel.queueBind(queue, "03-pubsub", "");

        // 8. æ¥æ”¶æ¶ˆæ¯
        /**
         * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
         * 1. é˜Ÿåˆ—åç§°ï¼šqueue
         * 2. æ˜¯å¦è‡ªåŠ¨ç¡®è®¤ï¼štrueï¼ˆè‡ªåŠ¨ç¡®è®¤æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼‰
         * 3. æ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†å›è°ƒï¼šDeliverCallback
         * 4. æ¶ˆæ¯å–æ¶ˆå›è°ƒï¼šCancelCallback
         */
        channel.basicConsume(queue, true, new DeliverCallback() {
            @Override
            public void handle(String consumerTag, Delivery delivery) throws IOException {
                try {
                    // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†è€—æ—¶
                    Thread.sleep(1000);
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
                System.out.println("æ¶ˆè´¹è€…2 æ¥æ”¶åˆ°æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼š" + new String(delivery.getBody()));
            }
        }, new CancelCallback() {
            @Override
            public void handle(String consumerTag) throws IOException {
                System.out.println("æ¶ˆæ¯è¢«å–æ¶ˆ");
            }
        });
    }
}

å…³é”®ç‚¹ï¼š â€‹

  1. ä¸€ä¸ªç”Ÿäº§è€…ï¼šå°†æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€åˆ° Direct äº¤æ¢æœºï¼Œå¹¶æŒ‡å®šè·¯ç”±é”®ã€‚

è·¯ç”±æ¨¡å¼é€‚ç”¨äºéœ€è¦æ ¹æ®ç‰¹å®šæ¡ä»¶ç²¾ç¡®è·¯ç”±æ¶ˆæ¯çš„åœºæ™¯ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚æ—¥å¿—çº§åˆ«åˆ†ç±»ã€ä»»åŠ¡åˆ†å‘ç­‰ã€‚

java
package top.miqiu._04_routing;

import com.rabbitmq.client.Channel;
import com.rabbitmq.client.Connection;
import com.rabbitmq.client.ConnectionFactory;
import com.rabbitmq.client.MessageProperties;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException;

public class Producer {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, TimeoutException {
        // 1. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å·¥å‚
        ConnectionFactory connectionFactory = new ConnectionFactory();
        // 2. è®¾ç½® RabbitMQ æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„ IPã€ç«¯å£ã€ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç 
        connectionFactory.setHost("ä½ çš„ipï¼ï¼ï¼");
        connectionFactory.setPort(5672);
        connectionFactory.setUsername("admin");
        connectionFactory.setPassword("admin");

        // 3. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = connectionFactory.newConnection();
        // 4. åˆ›å»º Channel
        Channel channel = connection.createChannel();

        // 5. å£°æ˜ Direct äº¤æ¢æœº
        /**
         * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
         * 1. äº¤æ¢æœºåç§°ï¼š04-routing
         * 2. äº¤æ¢æœºç±»å‹ï¼šdirect
         */
        channel.exchangeDeclare("04-routing", "direct");

        // 6. å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯
        for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
            String message = "hello work:" + i;
            /**
             * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
             * 1. äº¤æ¢æœºåç§°ï¼š04-routing
             * 2. è·¯ç”±é”®ï¼šerrï¼ˆæ¶ˆæ¯å°†å‘é€åˆ°ç»‘å®š err è·¯ç”±é”®çš„é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼‰
             * 3. æ¶ˆæ¯å±æ€§ï¼šMessageProperties.TEXT_PLAIN
             * 4. æ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹ï¼šå­—èŠ‚æ•°ç»„
             */
            channel.basicPublish("04-routing", "err", MessageProperties.TEXT_PLAIN, message.getBytes());
        }
        System.out.println("æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€æˆåŠŸ");

        // 7. å…³é—­èµ„æº
        channel.close();
        connection.close();
    }
}

å…³é”®ç‚¹ï¼š â€‹

  1. äº¤æ¢æœºå£°æ˜ï¼ˆexchangeDeclareï¼‰ï¼šåˆ›å»º Direct äº¤æ¢æœºï¼Œç±»å‹ä¸º directã€‚
  2. æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€ï¼ˆbasicPublishï¼‰ï¼šæŒ‡å®šè·¯ç”±é”®ï¼ˆå¦‚ errï¼‰ï¼Œæ¶ˆæ¯ä¼šè¢«å‘é€åˆ°ç»‘å®šè¯¥è·¯ç”±é”®çš„é˜Ÿåˆ—ã€‚
  3. è·¯ç”±é”®åŒ¹é…ï¼šåªæœ‰é˜Ÿåˆ—ç»‘å®šçš„è·¯ç”±é”®ä¸æ¶ˆæ¯çš„è·¯ç”±é”®å®Œå…¨åŒ¹é…æ—¶ï¼Œæ¶ˆæ¯æ‰ä¼šè¢«è·¯ç”±åˆ°è¯¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ã€‚

ï¼ˆä¸‰ï¼‰æ¶ˆè´¹è€…ä»£ç è§£æ â€‹

ä»£ç  â€‹

æ¶ˆè´¹è€…è´Ÿè´£åˆ›å»ºé˜Ÿåˆ—å¹¶ç»‘å®šåˆ° Direct äº¤æ¢æœºï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æŒ‡å®šè·¯ç”±é”®ã€‚

java
package top.miqiu._04_routing;

import com.rabbitmq.client.*;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException;

public class Consumer {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, TimeoutException {
        // 1. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å·¥å‚
        ConnectionFactory connectionFactory = new ConnectionFactory();
        // 2. è®¾ç½® RabbitMQ æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„ IPã€ç«¯å£ã€ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç 
        connectionFactory.setHost("ä½ çš„ipï¼ï¼ï¼");
        connectionFactory.setPort(5672);
        connectionFactory.setUsername("admin");
        connectionFactory.setPassword("admin");

        // 3. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = connectionFactory.newConnection();
        // 4. åˆ›å»º Channel
        Channel channel = connection.createChannel();

        // 5. å£°æ˜ Direct äº¤æ¢æœº
        channel.exchangeDeclare("04-routing", "direct");

        // 6. åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶é˜Ÿåˆ—
        String queue = channel.queueDeclare().getQueue();

        // 7. ç»‘å®šé˜Ÿåˆ—åˆ°äº¤æ¢æœºï¼Œå¹¶æŒ‡å®šè·¯ç”±é”®
        /**
         * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
         * 1. é˜Ÿåˆ—åç§°ï¼šqueue
         * 2. äº¤æ¢æœºåç§°ï¼š04-routing
         * 3. è·¯ç”±é”®ï¼šinfoã€errã€waring
         */
        channel.queueBind(queue, "04-routing", "info");
        channel.queueBind(queue, "04-routing", "err");
        channel.queueBind(queue, "04-routing", "waring");

        // 8. æ¥æ”¶æ¶ˆæ¯
        /**
         * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
         * 1. é˜Ÿåˆ—åç§°ï¼šqueue
         * 2. æ˜¯å¦è‡ªåŠ¨ç¡®è®¤ï¼štrueï¼ˆè‡ªåŠ¨ç¡®è®¤æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼‰
         * 3. æ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†å›è°ƒï¼šDeliverCallback
         * 4. æ¶ˆæ¯å–æ¶ˆå›è°ƒï¼šCancelCallback
         */
        channel.basicConsume(queue, true, new DeliverCallback() {
            @Override
            public void handle(String consumerTag, Delivery delivery) throws IOException {
                try {
                    // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†è€—æ—¶
                    Thread.sleep(1000);
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
                System.out.println("æ¶ˆè´¹è€…1 æ¥æ”¶åˆ°æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼š" + new String(delivery.getBody()));
            }
        }, new CancelCallback() {
            @Override
            public void handle(String consumerTag) throws IOException {
                System.out.println("æ¶ˆæ¯è¢«å–æ¶ˆ");
            }
        });
    }
}

java
package top.miqiu._05_topic;

import com.rabbitmq.client.Channel;
import com.rabbitmq.client.Connection;
import com.rabbitmq.client.ConnectionFactory;
import com.rabbitmq.client.MessageProperties;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException;

public class Producer {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, TimeoutException {
        // 1. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å·¥å‚
        ConnectionFactory connectionFactory = new ConnectionFactory();
        // 2. è®¾ç½® RabbitMQ æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„ IPã€ç«¯å£ã€ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç 
        connectionFactory.setHost("ç”¨è‡ªå·±çš„ipï¼ï¼");
        connectionFactory.setPort(5672);
        connectionFactory.setUsername("admin");
        connectionFactory.setPassword("admin");

        // 3. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = connectionFactory.newConnection();
        // 4. åˆ›å»º Channel
        Channel channel = connection.createChannel();

        // 5. å£°æ˜ Topic äº¤æ¢æœº
        /**
         * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
         * 1. äº¤æ¢æœºåç§°ï¼š05-topic
         * 2. äº¤æ¢æœºç±»å‹ï¼štopic
         */
        channel.exchangeDeclare("05-topic", "topic");

        // 6. å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯
        for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
            String message = "hello work:" + i;
            /**
             * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
             * 1. äº¤æ¢æœºåç§°ï¼š05-topic
             * 2. è·¯ç”±é”®ï¼šuser.hiï¼ˆæ¶ˆæ¯å°†å‘é€åˆ°åŒ¹é… user.* æˆ– user.# çš„é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼‰
             * 3. æ¶ˆæ¯å±æ€§ï¼šMessageProperties.TEXT_PLAIN
             * 4. æ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹ï¼šå­—èŠ‚æ•°ç»„
             */
            channel.basicPublish("05-topic", "user.hi", MessageProperties.TEXT_PLAIN, message.getBytes());
        }
        System.out.println("æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€æˆåŠŸ");

        // 7. å…³é—­èµ„æº
        channel.close();
        connection.close();
    }
}

å…³é”®ç‚¹ï¼š â€‹

  2. æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€ï¼ˆbasicPublishï¼‰ï¼šæŒ‡å®šè·¯ç”±é”®ï¼ˆå¦‚ user.hiï¼‰ï¼Œæ¶ˆæ¯ä¼šè¢«å‘é€åˆ°åŒ¹é…çš„é˜Ÿåˆ—ã€‚

java
package top.miqiu._05_topic;

import com.rabbitmq.client.*;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException;

public class Consumer2 {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, TimeoutException {
        // 1. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å·¥å‚
        ConnectionFactory connectionFactory = new ConnectionFactory();
        // 2. è®¾ç½® RabbitMQ æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„ IPã€ç«¯å£ã€ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç 
        connectionFactory.setHost("ç”¨è‡ªå·±çš„ipï¼ï¼");
        connectionFactory.setPort(5672);
        connectionFactory.setUsername("admin");
        connectionFactory.setPassword("admin");

        // 3. åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = connectionFactory.newConnection();
        // 4. åˆ›å»º Channel
        Channel channel = connection.createChannel();

        // 5. å£°æ˜ Topic äº¤æ¢æœº
        channel.exchangeDeclare("05-topic", "topic");

        // 6. åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶é˜Ÿåˆ—
        String queue = channel.queueDeclare().getQueue();

        // 7. ç»‘å®šé˜Ÿåˆ—åˆ°äº¤æ¢æœºï¼Œå¹¶æŒ‡å®šè·¯ç”±é”®æ¨¡å¼
        /**
         * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
         * 1. é˜Ÿåˆ—åç§°ï¼šqueue
         * 2. äº¤æ¢æœºåç§°ï¼š05-topic
         * 3. è·¯ç”±é”®æ¨¡å¼ï¼šuser.*ï¼ˆåŒ¹é… user.hiã€user.hello ç­‰ï¼‰
         */
        channel.queueBind(queue, "05-topic", "user.*");

        // 8. æ¥æ”¶æ¶ˆæ¯
        /**
         * å‚æ•°è¯´æ˜ï¼š
         * 1. é˜Ÿåˆ—åç§°ï¼šqueue
         * 2. æ˜¯å¦è‡ªåŠ¨ç¡®è®¤ï¼štrueï¼ˆè‡ªåŠ¨ç¡®è®¤æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼‰
         * 3. æ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†å›è°ƒï¼šDeliverCallback
         * 4. æ¶ˆæ¯å–æ¶ˆå›è°ƒï¼šCancelCallback
         */
        channel.basicConsume(queue, true, new DeliverCallback() {
            @Override
            public void handle(String consumerTag, Delivery delivery) throws IOException {
                try {
                    // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†è€—æ—¶
                    Thread.sleep(1000);
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
                System.out.println("æ¶ˆè´¹è€…2 user.* æ¥æ”¶åˆ°æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼š" + new String(delivery.getBody()));
            }
        }, new CancelCallback() {
            @Override
            public void handle(String consumerTag) throws IOException {
                System.out.println("æ¶ˆæ¯è¢«å–æ¶ˆ");
            }
        });
    }
}
